name="isMemberOfRequest"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="ns0:isMemberOfRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="isMemberOfResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" type="ns0:GroupMembershipServicePortType"> <http:binding verb="POST"/> <wsdl:operation name="isMemberOf"> <http:operation location="GroupMembershipService/isMemberOf"/> <wsdl:input> <mime:content part="isMemberOfRequest" type="text/xml"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <mime:content part="isMemberOfResponse" type="text/xml"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation
